title: 5 Creative Ways to Use Your NFC Card
author: WebNfc Team
excerpt: Your NFC card is more than just a digital business card. Explore five innovative ways to leverage its power, from sharing a music playlist to launching a video portfolio.
description: Your NFC card is more than just a digital business card. Explore five innovative ways to leverage its power, from sharing a music playlist to launching a video portfolio.
keywords: NFC card uses, creative networking, digital portfolio, lead generation, smart business cards, NFC marketing, NFC ideas, what to put on NFC card, NFC card actions
content:
Your NFC card is a versatile tool that goes far beyond just sharing your contact details. With a little creativity, you can turn it into a powerful marketing and engagement device. Here are five innovative ideas to get you started:

  1. Link to a Video Introduction: Instead of just text, have your card open a short, personal video where you introduce yourself and your work.
  2. Share a Curated Playlist: Are you a DJ, musician, or just want to share your vibe? Link your card to a Spotify or Apple Music playlist.
  3. Launch Your Portfolio: For designers, photographers, and artists, a direct link to your online portfolio is a must.
  4. Book a Meeting Instantly: Connect your card to your Calendly or scheduling link to make booking a meeting completely frictionless.
  5. Offer a Special Discount: Drive sales by linking your card to a unique landing page with a special offer for people you meet in person.
